title: Thousand Sinful Kisses
description: Seventeen year old Elva Frost's ochlophobist, non-active life takes a turn when she finds herself attracted to her new neighbor. But as she finds out that he's a demonic entity from a long-lost royal Dutch bloodline. Life becomes a horror fairy tale for her and her Rawspring community as she finds herself caught between the defile, dark species of the paranormal world.
author: Liam Levi
